about.heading: Where Nature and History Meet
about.description: Güneş Motel is located only 2 km from Mount Nemrut, making it one of the closest hotels to Mount Nemrut in the region. Positioned within the Malatya province at the easiest and fastest access point to Mount Nemrut, our motel offers comfortable accommodation to its guests with 13 rooms, 32 bed capacity, and a 40-person restaurant. Serving with over 30 years of experience, Güneş Motel is an ideal accommodation choice for Mount Nemrut sunrise and sunset visits, allowing guests to effortlessly and pleasantly experience the unique view of Nemrut.
about.detailedDescription:
Nemrut Güneş Motel is located in Büyüköz Village, Pütürge district of Malatya, only 2 km from UNESCO World Heritage Site Mount Nemrut, making it the closest accommodation facility in the region. Operated for over 30 years, our motel has become a trusted and well-established stopover that both domestic and international guests choose with confidence.

Thanks to our advantage of being the closest hotel to Mount Nemrut, we offer quick and easy access especially for Mount Nemrut sunrise and sunset tours. Our guests can experience this unique natural phenomenon without fatigue or time loss. Our location within Malatya province facilitates access to the region while also providing convenient reach to historical and cultural treasures such as Commagene Kingdom ruins on the Adıyaman side.

Our motel serves as an ideal base not only for those wishing to explore Mount Nemrut and Commagene historical sites but also for travelers seeking to visit tourist attractions in the Malatya and Adıyaman regions. Additionally, it offers a safe stopover where those traveling through Eastern and Southeastern Anatolia routes can rest and continue their journey peacefully.

With our 13 rooms, 32-bed capacity, and 40-person restaurant, we prepare a comfortable and welcoming environment for our guests. Our modern amenities include 24/7 hot water, free WiFi, central heating system, private parking, and spacious garden area. All our rooms feature mountain views and offer clean and spacious accommodation.

cendere.name: Cendere Bridge
cendere.desc: Ancient bridge from Roman times still in use today.

arsemia.name: Arsemia Ancient Site
arsemia.desc: Ruins of the summer capital of the Kingdom of Commagene.

kahta.name: Kahta Castle
kahta.desc: Historical castle from the Mamluk period.

perre.name: Perre Ancient City
perre.desc: Ancient city famous for its rock tombs and historical ruins.

somuncuBaba.name: Somuncu Baba Complex (Darende)
somuncuBaba.desc: Complex dedicated to Somuncu Baba; with its mosque, tomb and peaceful surroundings, it is a spiritual visit point.

gunpinar.name: Günpınar (Gürpınar) Waterfall
gunpinar.desc: Ideal waterfall for photography and nature walks with its turquoise waters and natural structure.

tohma.name: Tohma Canyon
tohma.desc: Canyon that attracts nature lovers with its steep cliffs and hiking trails.

levent.name: Levent Valley
levent.desc: Natural area famous for its canyon views, hiking trails and sunset viewing terraces.
